mapper.insert: insert into challenge (regdate, startdate, finishdate, detail, owner_id, subject_id,title) values ( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(#{finishDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') , #{detail}, #{owner_id}, #{subject_id},#{title})
